name: electron-vue-cli
description: 基于 Vue cli 的 Electron 项目

scripts.pre:npm: npm install --registry https://registry.npmmirror.com || npm install --registry https://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.pre:yarn: yarn install --registry https://registry.npmmirror.com || yarn install --registry https://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.pre:pnpm: pnpm install --registry https://registry.npmmirror.com || pnpm install --registry https://registry.npmjs.org

author: 徐晓伟 <xuxiaowei@xuxiaowei.com.cn>
